name: winter body oil
description:
Our third limited edition seasonal nourishing body oil, inspired by the deep forest in winter. 

Each season, I look forward to sharing a few of the truly unique and precious botanical essences I've fallen for in these limited edition compositions. The winter edition features the resinous complexity of a beautiful white cedar absolute from Canada, bright organic frankincense, and uplifting Douglas and Silver Fir essences from France, all in a silky base of nourishing organic oils. The barest hint of smoke comes from a touch of choya loban, a special dry distillation of HImalayan cedar and Indian frankincense.

An incredible sensory treat!

A few drops are just as lovely in the bath as they are slathered on afterwards. A little goes a long way.

{one 2 fl.oz. glass bottle of nourishing body oil with treatment pump}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic jojoba oil, organic coconut oil, organic rosehip seed oil, non-GMO vitamin e

Not recommended for pregnant or nursing mamas.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: winter getaway kit
autumn body oil - limited edition
description:
Our second limited edition seasonal nourishing body oil, sweet and comforting for the chilly nights of autumn. Warm notes of vanilla, almond, hay and spice mingle in a silky blend of organic oils.

Each season, we'll look forward to sharing a few of the truly unique and precious botanical essences we've fallen for in these limited edition compositions. The autumn edition showcases the nutty warmth of tonka bean absolute from Brazil, hay absolute from France, and a warm, round clove bud absolute from Indonesia. An incredible sensory treat!

A few drops are just as lovely in the bath as they are slathered on afterwards. A little goes a long way.

{one 2 fl.oz. glass bottle of nourishing body oil with treatment pump}

ingredients: organic apricot kernel oil, organic sesame oil, organic jojoba oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic coconut oil, tonka, hay, clove bud, peru balsam, sweet myrrh, non-GMO vitamin e

Not recommended for pregnant or nursing mamas.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: autumn getaway kit
rose & chamomile butter - 2.75 oz
description:
Our rose & chamomile butter is formulated with local beeswax and organic sesame, coconut and rosehip seed oils to nourish and protect the skin. Like the rest of our Rose & Chamomile collection, this butter is especially good for sensitive and "wise" skin because of the addition of rose otto and german chamomile essential oils, which soothe and promote elasticity, while also lending their gentle fragrance to the blend. 

Rosehip seed oil is very healing, and contains high levels of vitamin A, which promotes skin cell regeneration and is often used for healing skin stressed by time and the elements. Sesame oil contains vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. Coconut oil is simply luscious and is a powerful and soothing moisturizer, as well as possessing, antimicrobial and antioxidant properties.

This butter is slightly softer than our other balms, which makes it ideal for all-over use, especially after the bath.

Our Rose & Chamomile butter is gentle enough even for sensitive skin, and is full of soothing botanicals, but as with any product that's new to you, try a small patch test first to ensure its compatibility with your skin. As with all products containing essential oils, please consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.

{one 2.75 oz glass jar of rose & chamomile butter}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic coconut oil, organic rosehip seed oil, local beeswax, vitamin e, organic essential oil of german chamomile, organic essential oil of rose otto

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: nourishing body oil - 2 oz
description:
A silky blend of organic oils, scented gently with organic rose otto, organic cardamom, and wild Australian sandalwood. A few drops are just as lovely in the bath as they are slathered on afterwards. A little goes a long way.

{one 2 fl.oz. glass bottle of nourishing body oil with treatment pump}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic jojoba oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic coconut oil, wild Australian sandalwood, organic rose otto, organic cardamom, non-GMO vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: cardamom butter - 2.75 oz
description:
Our cardamom butter is formulated with local beeswax and organic sesame, coconut oils to nourish and protect the skin. Wild Australian sandalwood, a truly special pure vanilla essence and organic cardamom essential oil scent this warm and comforting balm. 

Sesame oil contains nourishing vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. Coconut oil is simply luscious and is a powerful and soothing moisturizer, as well as possessing, antimicrobial and antioxidant properties.

This butter is slightly softer than our other balms, which makes it ideal for all-over use, especially after the bath.

Our cardamom butter is gentle enough even for sensitive skin, and is full of soothing botanicals, but as with any product that's new to you, try a small patch test first to ensure its compatibility with your skin. As with all products containing essential oils, please consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.

{one 2.75 oz glass jar of cardamom butter}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic coconut oil, local beeswax, wild australian sandalwood, vanilla co2 extract, essential oil of organic cardamom, vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: nourishing serum with rose - one ounce
description:
Our most concentrated nourishing oil. This serum is filled with layer upon layer of exquisite botanical essences, all chosen for their richly moisturizing and renewing properties, and the gentle scent of neroli and organic rose otto restores both skin and spirit. A few drops applied before bed will yield a very healthy glow. 

{one 1 oz glass dropper bottle of nourishing serum}

ingredients: organic argan oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic sweet almond oil, organic evening primrose oil, organic sesame oil, organic tamanu oil, organic baobab oil, essential oil of neroli, wildcrafted essential oils of wild carrot seed and sea buckthorn, organic rose otto, non-GMO vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: rose & chamomile facial scrub - 2.75 oz
description:
Our marvelous signature facial scrub. Organic oats and organic pink rose petals exfoliate gently in a base of raw local honey, while organic sesame and rosehip seed oils nourish and protect. This scrub is especially good for sensitive and "wise" skin because of the addition of rose otto and german chamomile essential oils, which soothe and promote elasticity, while also lending their gentle fragrance to the blend. 

Rosehip seed oil is very healing, and contains high levels of vitamin A, which promotes skin cell regeneration and is often used for healing skin stressed by time and the elements. Sesame oil contains vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. 

The raw honey base makes this scrub very thick. To use, dip a clean spoon into the jar and take out the amount you need, massage between the palms to warm and soften, adding a small amount of warm water, if necessary to form a cleansing paste. Smooth the scrub on using a circular motion and rinse gently with warm water. Try to avoid getting water into the jar, as it contains no preservatives. Honey based mixtures can last almost indefinitely if no moisture is introduced; still-edible honey was found in King Tut's tomb, untouched for centuries!

ingredients:
raw local honey, organic oats, organic rose petals, organic chamomile, organic sesame oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic apricot kernel oil, non-GMO vitamin e, organic essential oil of german chamomile, organic essential oil of rose otto

Our facial scrub is gentle enough even for sensitive skin, and is full of soothing botanicals, but as with any product that's new to you, try a small patch test first to ensure its compatibility with your skin. As with all products containing essential oils, please consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.

{one 2.75 oz jar of scrub}

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: rosy lip tint
description:
The latest addition to our collection of nourishing lip balms.

Our signature creamy base of organic coconut and sesame oils and local beeswax is infused with wildcrafted alkanet root and pure rose clay for a gentle rosy tint, and scented with exquisite organic rose otto. Coconut oil is full of fatty acids that feed and protect your sweet little lips, while sesame oil contains lots of vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. 

The .5 oz tin travels neatly with you in pocket or purse, and also makes a lovely gift. 

ingredients: organic coconut oil, organic sesame oil, local beeswax, wildcrafted alkanet root, pure rose clay, organic rose otto, non-gmo vitamin e

name: spring tonic serum - 1/2 ounce
description:
No longer just for Spring! We've received so many requests to keep this serum in stock year round...after all, Spring is a state of mind!

This serum is formulated with organic jojoba oil, organic sweet almond, and organic cold-pressed evening primrose oil as its base. 

Jojoba is one of the most nourishing oils for the skin, and one of the most easily absorbed. It's composition is very closely related to the oils our skin naturally produces. 

Sweet almond oil is rich in fatty acids and is a wonderful skin-softener. Evening primrose oil has anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory properties and is greatly soothing to the skin. 

The serum is enriched with botanicals like chamomile, neroli, organic geranium and wild carrot oils that nourish the skin and provide aromatherapy benefits. 

Neroli is known for its calming and mood-lifting properties, chamomile soothes and geranium brings cheer. Vitamin E is a natural antioxidant - ours comes from a non-GMO source, and it is added to the blend to protect the integrity of the other oils. 

Use a dab of this serum on the face, especially under the eyes before going to bed, to reap its regenerative properties while you sleep. Or use it on the neck and hands anytime as a moisturizer.

{one 1/2 ounce glass dropper bottle of spring tonic serum}

ingredients:
organic jojoba oil, organic sweet almond oil, organic evening primrose oil, german chamomile essential oil, neroli essential oil, organic geranium essential oil, wild carrot seed oil, non-GMO vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love in New York City!

{one 5.5oz jar of scrub}

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: perfume serum no. 3 - sample
description:
Inspired by our passion for the alchemical magic that happens between roses and cardamom, this scent features notes of wood and spice layered over an autumn meadow of rose and hay, supported by the sweet warmth of exotic resins and balsams. The base of organic jojoba oil feels like nectar and nourishes the skin wherever it is worn.

Top: cardamom, pink pepper, himalayan cedarwood
Heart: rose, immortelle, beeswax
Base: opoponax, tonka, labdanum

All Marble & Milkweed scents are entirely botanical, no synthetics are used. Our botanical fragrances are earthy and spicy; they bloom and evolve upon contact with the warmth of the skin.

// Choosing a fragrance is a highly personal matter! We recommend trying a small sample before committing to a full-sized perfume.

// Each sample vial contains 1ml of pure, botanical fragrance, enough for 2-3 applications.

ingredients: organic jojoba oil, (our proprietary blend of 100% botanical essential oils, resin and absolutes) pink pepper, himalayan cedarwood, cardamom, rose, hay, beeswax, immortelle, tonka, opoponax, labdanum

As always, please consult your doctor about using any product containing essential oils if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: nourishing serum with rose - 1/2 ounce
description:
Our most concentrated nourishing oil. This serum is filled with layer upon layer of exquisite botanical essences, all chosen for their richly moisturizing and renewing properties, and the gentle scent of neroli and organic rose otto restores both skin and spirit. A few drops applied before bed will yield a very healthy glow. 

{one 1/2 oz glass dropper bottle of nourishing serum}

ingredients: organic argan oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic sweet almond oil, organic evening primrose oil, organic sesame oil, organic tamanu oil, organic baobab oil, essential oil of neroli, wildcrafted essential oils of wild carrot seed and sea buckthorn, organic rose otto, non-GMO vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: rose & chamomile cleansing grains - 1oz
description:
These extraordinarily fine & gentle cleansing grains begin with a base of organic oats, organic rose petals, and organic chamomile flowers. Oats are soothing and cooling to the skin, reducing redness and quelling irritation, while rose & chamomile tone, calm and balance the skin, and provide the most gentle exfoliation. They also lend our cleansing grains their delicate floral scent. 

Milk is naturally full of Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs), which help the skin naturally let go of dead skin cells, and it is replete with nourishing proteins.

Rhassoul clay from Morocco is universally admired for its cleansing properties. Impressively absorptive & detoxifying, it's a wonderful treatment for troubled skin. Its use improves elasticity & texture and the clay's mineral content (silica, magnesium, potassium and calcium) feeds the skin.

To use: Always dip into your grains with a clean, dry spoon to extend their lifespan. Add a tiny bit of water to a small spoonful of cleansing grains in your palm to make a paste. Massage onto wet skin, then rinse with warm water. To use as a masque, simply mix as directed, massage onto skin and leave on for desired time, perhaps 15-20 minutes. Rinse with warm water. To use in conjunction with our Rose & Chamomile Facial Tonic, substitute the tonic for water when mixing the grains. Or simply use the tonic after you've rinsed the grains off to finish your treatment.

Our cleansing grains are finely textured enough for everyday use and full of soothing botanicals, but as with any product that's new to you, try a small patch test first to ensure its compatibility with your skin.

{one 1 oz jar of cleansing grains}

ingredients: 
organic oats, organic rose petals, organic chamomile flowers, Rhassoul clay, organic milk powder

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: 13.5 oz double-wall glass teapot
description:
This exquisite handblown glass teapot comes to us from the Five Mountains Tea Company in San Francisco. Double-walled borosilcate lab-quality glass frames your tea leaves beautifully, and insulates both hot and iced beverages. Comes with a removable stainless steel spiral spring filter.

{each teapot holds 13.5 oz liquid}

name: rose & cardamom bathing salts
description:
Gorgeously pure Himalayan pink salt crystals are dressed with a nourishing dab of organic coconut & sesame oils, and scented alluringly with organic cardamom and rose otto essential oils.

These bath salts are a luxurious addition to a warm bath before bed, or an indulgent treat for a weekend morning bath.

Our pink salt is sustainably hand-harvested from ancient sea salt deposits deep in the Himalayan mountain range, and dried in the sun. This salt is notable for its purity, and is rich in calcium, magnesium, potassium, iron and other trace minerals. It's known for its circulation stimulating, detoxifying, and relaxing properties.

{one 10 oz glass jar of bathing salts}

As always, if you are pregnant or nursing, please check with your doctor before using any products containing essential oils.

ingredients: Himalayan pink salt, organic coconut oil, organic sesame oil, non-GMO vitamin E, organic essential oil of rose otto, organic essential oil of cardamom

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: nourishing body oil - sample
description:
A silky blend of organic oils, scented gently with organic rose otto, organic cardamom, and wild Australian sandalwood. A few drops are just as lovely in the bath as they are slathered on afterwards. A little goes a long way.

{one screw-top 3.7 ml glass sample vial of nourishing body oil}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic jojoba oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic coconut oil, wild Australian sandalwood, organic rose otto, organic cardamom, non-GMO vitamin e

description:
This exquisite handblown glass decanter, perfect for brewing tea for one, comes to us from the Five Mountains Tea Company in San Francisco. Double-walled borosilcate lab-quality glass frames your tea leaves beautifully, and insulates both hot and iced beverages. 

{each tea decanter holds 8 oz liquid}

description:

The base of organic jojoba oil and local beeswax nourishes the skin wherever it is worn.

Top: cardamom, pink pepper, himalayan cedarwood
Heart: rose, immortelle, beeswax
Base: opoponax, tonka, labdanum

All Marble & Milkweed scents are entirely botanical, no synthetics are used. Our botanical fragrances are earthy and spicy; they bloom and evolve upon contact with the warmth of the skin.

name: himalayan quartz drinking crystal
description:
One of these clear, natural beauties is just exquisite in the bottom of your teacup.

{each 1-2 inch quartz crystal comes in a reusable muslin bag}

name: bath nectar
description:
Deceptively simple, ambrosially-scented, our bath nectar is delicate, moisturizing and will leave you wonderfully soft. 

Local raw honey is blended with organic coconut and sesame oils for a smooth and nourishing bath accoutrement. Scoop it from the jar using a clean spoon and use it all over the body as you would a bath gel or a scrub.

{one 5.5oz glass jar of bath nectar}

Please note: because of the natural seasonal variations in raw, unprocessed honey, our Bath Nectar may vary in color from a pale creamy color to a deep golden hue. The color of honey is dependent on what time of year the honey was harvested, and thus from which plants the bees collected their nectar.

ingredients: local raw honey, organic sesame oil, organic coconut oil, non-GMO vitamin E

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love in New York City!

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: tea sampler
rose & chamomile facial tonic - 4 oz
description:
An astonishingly simple blend of exquisitely pure ingredients, our Tonic is based on wildcrafted witch hazel, distilled in small batches by Wild Root Botanicals in Bellingham, WA. Organic Bulgarian rose & organic chamomile hydrosols complete the blend, infusing it with their healing properties and a divine floral fragrance.

Witch hazel is richly nourishing ingredient for the skin and has astringent, anti-inflammatory, antimicrobial, antibacterial, and antifungal properties, which make it an excellent choice for all skin types. It refreshes and tones and is wonderful for cleansing and balancing oily skin.

Organic Rose hydrosol is the result of the steam distillation process, which yields both the precious rose essential oil and the hydrosol. It's an excellent regulator of oil production while helping to balance the pH of the skin. It also smells utterly marvelous! Organic Chamomile hydrosol is a powerful anti-inflammatory with cooling & soothing properties. It does wonders for sensitive skin.

to use:
Sweep a small amount of Facial Tonic on a cotton puff across the skin after cleansing, or to remove make-up. Can also be used at any time during the day to renew and refresh. 

Because hydrosols are extraordinarily delicate & powerful plant essences, we do recommend that you store this tonic in the fridge, or at least a cool spot below 75F. It will stay fresh much longer this way, and feels even more refreshing to the skin - especially in the summer months! Please use within 6 months of purchase.

{one 4 fl.oz. glass bottle of Rose & Chamomile facial tonic}

ingredients: wildcrafted witch hazel hydrosol, organic bulgarian rose hydrosol, organic german chamomile hydrosol

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: forest tea
description:
A walk in the deep woods. This blend evokes the spirit of the forest with organic heirloom pu-erh, organic lapsang souchong, wild-harvested douglas fir tips, and the delicate woodland character of blackberry and violet leaves. Aromatic and earthy, with a touch of smoke, this blend will be the perfect companion for the first brisk days ahead.

Use 1 tbsp. tea leaves for 8oz water. Pour boiling water over the tea and steep for 4 minutes. Strain and sip.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Forest Tea}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

ingredients: organic heirloom pu-erh, organic lapsing souchong, organic blackberry leaves, organic violet leaves, wild-harvested douglas fir tips, organic blue cornflowers

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

description:
No longer just for Spring! We've received so many requests to keep this serum in stock year round...after all, Spring is a state of mind!

This serum is formulated with organic jojoba oil, organic sweet almond, and organic cold-pressed evening primrose oil as its base.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love in New York City!

name: camellia blossom tisane
description:
Our organic heirloom camellia blossoms, from the tea plant (camellia sinensis) are redolent of stone fruit and nectar, and blend elegantly with organic white mulberries, South Indian organic vanilla, saffron and sacred lotus stamens. A delicately sweet infusion with the barest trace of caffeine, this blend is the perfect way to welcome in the golden glow of Autumn.

Use 1 tablespoon tisane per cup. Pour not quite simmering water over the tea and steep for 4 minutes. Strain and serve.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Camellia Blossom Tisane}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

ingredients: organic camellia blossoms, organic white mulberries, organic South Indian vanilla, saffron, sacred lotus stamens (cultivated without chemicals)

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: fleurs + cacao
description:
Completely organic, Fleurs + Cacao is floral, aromatic and sensuous. It's the perfect brew for a cozy, romantic evening when the wind is howling at the door. And it's equally seductive over ice.

A base of organic green and white jasmine teas (including the sought-after, luxurious Jasmine Pearl) is blended with rose petals, roasted cacao nibs, goji berries and a ravishing organic vanilla from the south of India. The resulting steep is a gorgeous golden color with the scent of flowers and chocolate...

To brew a cup of Fleurs + Cacao: Bring 8 ounces of water to the point just below a simmer, pour over 2 teaspoons of loose tea blend, steep no longer than 3 minutes, strain and sip. Loose green teas are marvelous when steeped again, giving you a different, more delicate and subtle liqueur to explore.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Fleurs + Cacao}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea

ingredients: organic jasmine green tea, organic jasmine pearls tea, organic rose petals, organic jasmine blossoms, organic roasted cacao nibs, organic goji berries, organic vanilla

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: repair balm
description:
A few nourishing additions to our signature repair balm: a dab of organic fair-trade shea butter lends creaminess, a touch of organic tamanu oil gently heals, and Bulgarian rose absolute and organic rose otto luxuriously soothe the skin and spirit.

Our repair balm is filled to the brim with "skin food" essences, extracts and oils, including organic rosehip CO2 extract, wild carrot seed and sea buckthorn. 

Our signature base of organic coconut, sesame oils and local beeswax is supplemented with organic rosehip seed oil for extra antioxidant repair power. Organic rosehip CO2 extract contains tons of essential fatty acids, vitamins and minerals and is known for its skin-rejuvenating properties. It has been shown to improve skin elasticity and to aid in the regeneration of skin cells. Wild carrot seed oil provides carotal to help nourish and renew, and sea buckthorn extract contains high levels of vitamin A and E, which work to destroy free radicals. 

Concentrated, yet gentle and soothing, this balm can be used anywhere skin needs nourishing, from lips to hands to under the eyes.

ingredients: organic coconut oil, organic fair-trade shea butter, organic sesame oil, organic cold pressed rose hip seed oil, local beeswax, organic rosehip co2 extract, organic tamanu oil, wild carrot seed oil, sea buckthorn extract, organic rose otto, Bulgarian rose absolute, non-gmo vitamin e

As with all products containing essential oils and extracts, please consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love in New York City!

name: rose & chamomile cleansing nectar - 4 oz
description:
A gently cleansing base of raw local honey and organic vegetable glycerine are joined by the healing botanical essences of organic German Chamomile and organic Bulgarian Rose Otto. Honey has amazing anti-microbial and anti-oxidant properties and has been used in skin care for centuries to purify and nourish the skin. Rose Otto is known for its restorative properties, while Chamomile gently soothes and calms.

Cleansing nectar feels silky, smells gently floral and will not strip the skin of its natural oils. It's a wonderful cleanser for dry, sensitive or mature skin. It's best used after removing any make-up.

To use: Massage a small amount of cleansing nectar into damp skin, then rinse with warm water.

{one 4 fl.oz. glass bottle of cleansing nectar}

ingredients: raw local honey, organic vegetable glycerine, organic essential oil of rose otto, organic essential oil of german chamomile

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: rose & chamomile white tea
description:
A most elegant tea blend that will lift your spirits and leave you feeling refreshed and centered. 

Our Organic Rose & Chamomile White tea is a completely organic tea blend inspired by our Rose & Chamomile Collection. 

"As within, so without" is the the ethos behind this blend, which highlights the healing power of organic botanicals. Rose, chamomile and white tea are all wonderful for your beauty regimen when applied to the skin, and they're just as beneficial as an infusion. Chamomile is a calming, soothing herb, while rose balances and tones. White tea is the least processed of all the teas, making it extraordinarily high in anti-oxidants. It's also the lowest in caffeine when properly brewed, making this delicate, floral blend perfect in the morning, or as a pick-me-up in the afternoon. It is delicious both hot and iced. The delicate floral aroma is wonderful on its own, or sweetened with a touch of raw honey.

Use 1 tablespoon tea leaves per cup. Pour not quite simmering water over the tea and steep for 4 minutes. Strain and serve.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Organic Rose & Chamomile White Tea}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

ingredients: organic white tea, organic rose petals, organic chamomile blossoms

A Note: Please consult your doctor before using any herbal blend, especially if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: solid perfume no. 1
description:
Spicy and sweet, with a rich jasmine heart, our signature scent is made from only the finest natural botanical oils, resins, concretes and absolutes. The base of organic jojoba oil and local beeswax nourishes the skin wherever it is worn.

Head: cardamom, black pepper
Heart: jasmine, nutmeg
Base: vanilla, sandalwood, lapsang souchong, peru balsam, benzoin

All Marble & Milkweed scents are entirely botanical, no synthetics are used. Our botanical fragrances are earthy and spicy; they bloom and evolve upon contact with the warmth of the skin.

// Choosing a fragrance is a highly personal matter! We recommend trying a small sample before committing to a full-sized perfume.

// Each twist-top tin contains .5oz of solid botanical fragrance

ingredients: organic jojoba oil, local beeswax, (our proprietary blend of 100% botanical essential oils, resin and absolutes) organic lapsang souchong black tea, peru balsam, benzoin resin, wild australian sandalwood, vanilla, vetiver, patchouli, jasmine grandiflorum, jasmine sambac, cardamom, nutmeg, black pepper, pink pepper

As always, please consult your doctor about using any product containing essential oils if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: perfume serum no. 2
description:
Perfume serum No. 2 is a voluptuous blend of tuberose, saffron and wild sweet orange, complemented by neroli, sandalwood and ginger, and supported by vanilla and a gentle dab of musk. Rich and exotic, our No. 2 fragrance is inspired by dreams of palace gardens at dusk and the heady and magical scent in the souk where the flower-seller stands next to the spice merchant. The base of organic jojoba oil feels like nectar and nourishes the skin wherever it is worn.

Top: wild sweet orange, ginger, saffron
Heart: tuberose, neroli
Base: ambrette seed, sandalwood, vanilla

// Each glass roll-on bottle has a stainless steel roller-ball and contains 10ml of pure, botanical fragrance.

// Choosing a fragrance is a highly personal matter! We recommend trying a small sample before committing to a full-sized perfume.

ingredients: (our proprietary blend of 100% botanical essential oils and absolutes) saffron, tuberose, orange blossom, wild sweet orange, bitter orange, neroli, ginger, sandalwood, vanilla, ambrette seed

As always, please consult your doctor about using any product containing essential oils if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: green glow elixir
description:
Our green glow elixir is based on organic Sencha tea leaves which are handpicked on a cool Japanese spring day. We blend the resulting tea with organic matcha powder and the most delicate touch of organic spearmint. This tea is excellent hot or iced, and makes a wonderfully refreshing summer brew. The addition of spearmint makes it a very civilized way to settle the stomach, as well.

Green tea is astoundingly high in anti-oxidants and is known for its cleansing and uplifting properties. The taste of this tea is rich, green and gently sweet, and brews up to an intoxicating jade hue. Contains caffeine.

Directions: Bring 8 ounces of water to the point just below a simmer, pour over 1 teaspoon of Green Glow Elixir, steep no longer than 3 minutes, strain and sip.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Green Glow Elixir tea}

ingredients: organic sencha green tea, organic matcha green tea, organic spearmint

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: solid perfume no. 2
description:
Solid Perfume No. 2 is a voluptuous blend of tuberose, saffron and wild sweet orange, complemented by neroli, sandalwood and ginger, and supported by vanilla and a gentle dab of musk. Rich and exotic, our No. 2 fragrance is inspired by dreams of palace gardens at dusk and the heady and magical scent in the souk where the flower-seller stands next to the spice merchant. The base of organic jojoba oil and local beeswax nourishes the skin wherever it is worn.

Top: wild sweet orange, ginger, saffron

ingredients: organic jojoba oil, local beeswax, (our proprietary blend of 100% botanical essential oils and absolutes) saffron, tuberose, orange blossom, sweet orange, bitter orange, neroli, ginger, sandalwood, vanilla, ambrette seed

As always, please consult your doctor about using any product containing essential oils if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: rose & chamomile butter - 1.5 oz
description:
Our rose & chamomile butter is formulated with local beeswax and organic sesame, coconut and rosehip seed oils to nourish and protect the skin. Like the rest of our Rose & Chamomile collection, this butter is especially good for sensitive and "wise" skin because of the addition of rose otto and german chamomile essential oils, which soothe and promote elasticity, while also lending their gentle fragrance to the blend. 

Rosehip seed oil is very healing, and contains high levels of vitamin A, which promotes skin cell regeneration and is often used for healing skin stressed by time and the elements. Sesame oil contains vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. Coconut oil is simply luscious and is a powerful and soothing moisturizer, as well as possessing, antimicrobial and antioxidant properties.

This butter is slightly softer than our other balms, which makes it ideal for all-over use, especially after the bath.

Our Rose & Chamomile butter is gentle enough even for sensitive skin, and is full of soothing botanicals, but as with any product that's new to you, try a small patch test first to ensure its compatibility with your skin. As with all products containing essential oils, please consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.

{one 1 oz glass jar of rose & chamomile butter}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic coconut oil, organic rosehip seed oil, local beeswax, vitamin e, organic essential oil of german chamomile, organic essential oil of rose otto

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: modern chai no. 2
description:
Our loose-leaf Modern Chai No. 2 has its roots in the magical union of chocolate and saffron. Both precious commodities have rich histories of inspiring love and art, among other pursuits. Saffron even receives a rather lusty and poetic mention in the Song of Solomon:

"Your lips drop sweetness like honeycomb, my bride, syrup and milk are under your tongue, and your dress had the scent of Lebanon. Your cheeks are an orchard of pomegranates, an orchard full of rare fruits, spikenard and saffron, sweet cane and cinnamon.	

Organic, fairly-traded assam tea from India forms the base of our second house blend (contains caffeine!), while organic cardamom, organic ginger and organic ceylon cinnamon lend their classic chai spiciness. Exotic saffron and organic, fairly-traded cacao give this blend its rich and mysterious character. Slowing down enough to brew up a cup of this loose leaf chai will soothe and renew the spirit.

To brew a gorgeous cup of chai: simmer 1/2 cup water & 1/2 cup of your favorite milk, add 2 tbsp. chai (feel free to add more or less, according to your preferences), simmer for 5 minutes. Strain, sweeten & enjoy. This chai, as well as Modern Chai No. 1 are also delicious over ice on warm days.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Modern Chai No. 2}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

ingredients: organic assam black tea, organic cardamom, organic ceylon cinnamon, organic fair-trade cacao, organic ginger, saffron

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: simple lip balm
description:
Gently scented by the organic coconut and sesame oils and local beeswax (the ginger version also has a touch of organic shea butter), this lip balm is nourishing powerhouse. Coconut oil is full of fatty acids that feed and protect your sweet little lips, while sesame oil contains lots of vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. 

The .5 oz tin travels neatly with you in pocket or purse, and also makes a lovely gift. Choose from three versions: simple lip balm (no scent), simple cardamom lip balm or simple ginger lip balm.

simple lip balm ingredients: organic coconut oil, organic sesame oil, non-gmo vitamin e, local beeswax

simple cardamom lip balm ingredients: organic coconut oil, organic sesame oil, organic essential oil of cardamom, non-gmo vitamin e, local beeswax

simple ginger lip balm ingredients: organic coconut oil, organic sesame oil, organic fair-trade shea butter, essential oil of fresh ginger, non-gmo vitamin e, local beeswax

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: cardamom butter - 1.5 oz
description:
Our cardamom butter is formulated with local beeswax and organic sesame, coconut oils to nourish and protect the skin. Wild Australian sandalwood, a truly special pure vanilla essence and organic cardamom essential oil scent this warm and comforting balm. 

Sesame oil contains nourishing vitamin E, and has been a favorite ingredient in Ayurvedic skin care for thousands of years. Coconut oil is simply luscious and is a powerful and soothing moisturizer, as well as possessing, antimicrobial and antioxidant properties.

This butter is slightly softer than our other balms, which makes it ideal for all-over use, especially after the bath.

Our cardamom butter is gentle enough even for sensitive skin, and is full of soothing botanicals, but as with any product that's new to you, try a small patch test first to ensure its compatibility with your skin. As with all products containing essential oils, please consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.

{one 1.5 oz glass jar of cardamom butter}

ingredients: organic sesame oil, organic coconut oil, local beeswax, wild australian sandalwood, vanilla co2 extract, essential oil of organic cardamom, vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: spring tonic tea
description:
A gorgeously colorful tea blend that will lift your spirits and leave you feeling refreshed and centered. Our spring tonic tea is a completely organic herbal tisane (no caffeine!) that has been designed with Spring in mind, to cleanse, renew and nourish. It contains healthful and soothing organic herbs: calendula flowers, nettle leaf, red clover blossoms, chamomile, lemon verbena, rose hips and rose petals. This carefully blended tisane is wonderful in the morning, or in the evening after a bath to restore a sense of balance and tranquility during the seasonal transition.

Use 1 heaping teaspoon per cup. Pour boiling water over the tea and steep for 3-5 minutes. Strain and serve.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Spring Tonic Tea}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

ingredients: organic calendula flowers, organic red clover flowers, organic nettle leaves, organic rosehips, organic rose petals, organic chamomile flowers, lemon verbena

A Note: Please consult your doctor before using any herbal blend. Do not use this blend if you are pregnant or nursing.

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: modern chai no. 1
description:
Our Modern Chai No. 1 is inspired by my dreamy little house on Rivington Street. The exotic and familiar come together: the rhythm of the street below, history, memory, nostalgia, spice. An inspiring elixir!

Organic, fairly-traded assam tea from India forms the base of our house blend, while organic cardamom & rose petals lend a spicy, floral note. Organic ceylon cinnamon, organic pink peppercorns, organic ginger and South Indian vanilla beans round off a melange that is as lovely to look at as to drink. Slowing down enough to brew up a cup of this loose leaf chai will soothe the spirit

To brew a gorgeous cup of chai: simmer 1/2 cup water & 1/2 cup of your favorite milk, add 2 tbsp. chai (feel free to add more or less, according to your preferences), simmer for 5 minutes. Strain, sweeten & enjoy.

{one 2 oz compostable bag of Modern Chai No. 1}

Please reuse, compost or recycle this bag after you have enjoyed all of your tea.

ingredients: organic assam black tea, organic ceylon cinnamon, organic cardamom, organic rose petals, organic pink peppercorns, organic ginger, organic South Indian vanilla

A quick note to our Australian shoppers: because of current Australian customs restrictions on the importation of whole pink peppercorns, we are unable to ship this tea blend to Australia. So sorry about this, and thanks for your understanding!

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: spring tonic serum - sample
description:
No longer just for Spring! We've received so many requests to keep this serum in stock year round...after all, Spring is a state of mind!

This serum is formulated with organic jojoba oil, organic sweet almond, and organic cold-pressed evening primrose oil as its base. 

Jojoba is one of the most nourishing oils for the skin, and one of the most easily absorbed. It's composition is very closely related to the oils our skin naturally produces. 

Sweet almond oil is rich in fatty acids and is a wonderful skin-softener. Evening primrose oil has anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory properties and is greatly soothing to the skin. 

The serum is enriched with botanicals like chamomile, neroli, organic geranium and wild carrot oils that nourish the skin and provide aromatherapy benefits. 

Neroli is known for its calming and mood-lifting properties, chamomile soothes and geranium brings cheer. Vitamin E is a natural antioxidant - ours comes from a non-GMO source, and it is added to the blend to protect the integrity of the other oils. 

Use a dab of this serum on the face, especially under the eyes before going to bed, to reap its regenerative properties while you sleep. Or use it on the neck and hands anytime as a moisturizer.

Each sample vial contains 1ml of spring tonic serum, enough for 2-3 applications.

ingredients: organic jojoba oil, organic sweet almond oil, organic evening primrose oil, german chamomile essential oil, neroli essential oil, organic geranium essential oil, wild carrot seed oil, non-GMO vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love in New York City!

name: nourishing serum with rose - sample
description:
Our most concentrated nourishing oil. This serum is filled with layer upon layer of exquisite botanical essences, all chosen for their richly moisturizing and renewing properties, and the gentle scent of neroli and organic rose otto restores both skin and spirit. A few drops applied before bed will yield a very healthy glow. 

{one 1ml glass sample vial of nourishing serum}

ingredients: organic argan oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic sweet almond oil, organic evening primrose oil, organic sesame oil, organic tamanu oil, organic baobab oil, essential oil of neroli, wildcrafted essential oils of wild carrot seed and sea buckthorn, organic rose otto, non-GMO vitamin e

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!

name: rose & chamomile facial tonic - 2 oz
description:
An astonishingly simple blend of exquisitely pure ingredients, our Tonic is based on wildcrafted witch hazel, distilled in small batches by Wild Root Botanicals in Bellingham, WA. Organic Bulgarian rose & organic chamomile hydrosols complete the blend, infusing it with their healing properties and a divine floral fragrance.

Witch hazel is richly nourishing ingredient for the skin and has astringent, anti-inflammatory, antimicrobial, antibacterial, and antifungal properties, which make it an excellent choice for all skin types. It refreshes and tones and is wonderful for cleansing and balancing oily skin.

Organic Rose hydrosol is the result of the steam distillation process, which yields both the precious rose essential oil and the hydrosol. It's an excellent regulator of oil production while helping to balance the pH of the skin. It also smells utterly marvelous! Organic Chamomile hydrosol is a powerful anti-inflammatory with cooling & soothing properties. It does wonders for sensitive skin.

to use:
Sweep a small amount of Facial Tonic on a cotton puff across the skin after cleansing, or to remove make-up. Can also be used at any time during the day to renew and refresh. 

Because hydrosols are extraordinarily delicate & powerful plant essences, we do recommend that you store this tonic in the fridge, or at least a cool spot below 75F. It will stay fresh much longer this way, and feels even more refreshing to the skin - especially in the summer months! Please use within 6 months of purchase.

{one 2 fl.oz. glass bottle of Rose & Chamomile facial tonic}

ingredients: wildcrafted witch hazel hydrosol, organic bulgarian rose hydrosol, organic german chamomile hydrosol

All Marble & Milkweed products are made by hand and with love, in New York City!
